instructions: From any home screen, tap Phone . Select the Keypad or Logs tab. Tap Menu > Settings . Tap Call . Tap Call rejection . Tap Auto reject list . Tap Create . Tap the Contacts icon. To enter the number manually: Enter the number. If desired, choose a match criteria option: Exactly the same as (default) Starts with Ends with Includes Tap Save when done. To search for the number: Tap Contacts . Select the Logs or Contacts tab. Tap the number to reject or tap the contact to add to the reject list. Tap Save .
Enter the number. If desired, choose a match criteria option: Exactly the same as (default) Starts with Ends with Includes Tap Save when done.
Tap Contacts . Select the Logs or Contacts tab. Tap the number to reject or tap the contact to add to the reject list. Tap Save .

From any home screen, tap Phone . Select the Keypad or Logs tab. Tap Menu > Settings . Tap Call . Tap Call rejection . Tap Auto reject list . To allow calls but leave number on the list, clear the check box next to the number. To allow calls and remove number from the list: Tap the trash can . Select the check box next to the number. Tap Done .
Tap the trash can . Select the check box next to the number. Tap Done .

From any home screen, tap Phone . Select the Keypad or Logs tab. Tap Menu > Settings . Tap Call . Tap Additional settings . Tap Call forwarding . Tap Always forward . Enter the phone number to forward your calls to. Tap Turn on .

From any home screen, tap Phone. Select the Keypad or Logs tab. Tap Menu > Settings . Tap Call . Tap Additional settings . Tap Call forwarding . Select the desired option: Forward when busy Forward when unanswered Forward when unreachable Enter the phone number to forward calls to. Tap Update .
From any home screen, tap Phone . Select the Keypad or Logs tab. Tap Menu > Settings . Tap Call . Tap Additional settings . Tap Call forwarding . Tap Always forward . Tap Turn off .

From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under APPLICATIONS , tap Call . Tap Additional settings . The system reads the settings. It may take a few seconds for the next screen to load. Tap Caller ID and then select a display setting: Network default Hide number Show number
From any home screen, tap the Phone icon. Select the Logs tab. Tap Menu > Delete . Tap Select all . Tap Done . Tap OK
From any home screen, tap the Phone icon. Select the Logs tab. View the call logs. Tap a call to view more details.
